name: Tales Of Brittlebreach
description:
Yes, a 3D game purely written in a 2D engine, because why not ^^

It's not much more than a prototype, but this year's Jam motivated me to at least start this project.

Performance is horrible, I just threw more and more objects into the scene without caring about optimization. Will fix later :)

Might also crash on some GPUs because OpenGL likes to bully me.

Link to 3DreamEngine: https://github.com/3dreamengine/3DreamEngine
